languages.text: "А Глейто и твоя инфопластина? Все ложь?"
"What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"
languages.original_text: "А Глейто и твоя инфопластина? Все ложь?"

traits.locale_text: "What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"
"What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"
"What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"
"What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"
"What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"
"What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"

languages.text: 「グライトと君のデータスレートの件は？あれも嘘だったのか？」
languages.original_text: "What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"

traits.locale_text: 「グライトと君のデータスレートの件は？あれも嘘だったのか？」

languages.text: "Was ist mit Glaito und Eurem Datablock? War das auch eine Lüge?"
languages.original_text: "What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"

traits.locale_text: "Was ist mit Glaito und Eurem Datablock? War das auch eine Lüge?"

languages.text: « Qu'en est-il de Glaito et de votre plaque de données ? Ça aussi, c'était des mensonges ? »
languages.original_text: "What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'en est-il de Glaito et de votre plaque de données ? Ça aussi, c'était des mensonges ? »

languages.text: «¿Y qué hay de Glaito y su tablilla de datos? ¿Eso también era mentira?».
languages.original_text: "What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué hay de Glaito y su tablilla de datos? ¿Eso también era mentira?».

languages.text: “格雷托和你的数据板呢？那也是谎言吗？”
languages.original_text: "What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"

traits.locale_text: “格雷托和你的数据板呢？那也是谎言吗？”

languages.text: "Peki ya Glaito ve databelan hakkında söylediklerin? Onlar da mı yalandı?"
languages.original_text: "What about Glaito and your data-slate? Was that a lie too?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki ya Glaito ve databelan hakkında söylediklerin? Onlar da mı yalandı?"
